### **Working as a Student**

How many hours can I work per week as an international student?
Max 20 hours/week. Third-country students are limited to 120 full or 240 half days/year, except for research assistant roles.

Is there a minimum wage in Germany?
Yes! Since Jan 2024, it’s €12.41/hour. Never start a job without a contract—review requirements here: (https://www.make-it-in-germany.com/en/working-in-germany/working-environment/work-contract).

Can I freelance while studying?

No, self-employment isn’t allowed for third-country students. Stick to part-time jobs or mini-jobs (details: https://www.utn.de/en/study/working-as-a-student/).
